title: Monetize your social media with NFTs… and build generational wealth
itunes:title: Monetize your social media with NFTs… and build generational wealth
description: I start today’s podcast with the headlines you should pay attention to about digital assets, NFTs, and the billions flowing into this space… Then, Dr. Ravi Singh, internet pioneer with a Ph.D in social media and technology, joins me to explain what you need to know about NFTs… how you could use them to monetize your social media—and even build generational wealth for your great-grandkids… and why NFTs will be extremely valuable in the metaverse. Plus, he shares what he learned about influence and engagement from analyzing Trump’s tweets. I break down why Wall Street still isn’t grasping this the potential of NFTs… and why they represent an opportunity like no other for life-changing returns. In this episode   Positive news stories in crypto/NFTs [0:30] Dr. Ravi Singh explains what you need to know about NFTs [9:00] Your social media could be an NFT goldmine [11:05]  What happens to your content when you die? [15:20] Why NFTs are valuable in the metaverse [16:58] Why NFTs represent the opportunity of a lifetime [20:40]  Enjoyed this episode?
